column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I didn't want to go here
column2: but my good friend Jamie C. was visiting from Miami and she wanted some tapas.  The very first complaint was the sangria is really really weak
column3: they use taps to dispense.  I think we consumed 12 pitchers between six people and I couldn't even get a buzz.  I think Jamie C. was drunk on something else if she thought the paella was good
column4: sadly it was a mushy excuse for good paella.  The one positive dish was bacon wrapped dates
column5: they were fantastic.  Service can rapid fire with 6 dishes at once
